title: The Walls of Waffles
content: This impressive paella is a perfect party dish and a fun meal to cook together with your guests.

sections.title: Offer:
sections.content: Get a free ice-cream with every waffle.

title: Chicken Curry
content: This delicious chicken curry is perfect for a weeknight meal.

sections.title: Requirement:
sections.content: You need fresh chicken, spices, and vegetables.

sections.title: Method:
sections.content: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onions, garlic, and ginger, and cook until golden. ...
